unfinished: Message shown when a feature is marked as unfinished.

restore.label: The title of the dialog prompting users for a reason to restore.
restore.helperText: Text prompting the users to enter a reason

actions.ok: The text of the restore button

rollback.label: The title of the dialog prompting users for a reason to restore.
rollback.helperText: Text prompting the users to enter a reason

actions.ok: The text of the rollback button

toasts.pleaseWait: Self-explanatory, used when something is loading
toasts.restoreError: Used when a restore throws an error
toasts.rollbackError: Used when an attempted rollback throws an error
toasts.newerRev: While attempting to rollback, a newer revision was detected, so the rollback cannot continue
toasts.userUndefined: Used when a user is undefined, usually when the user doesn't exist, can't be found, or is suppressed/oversighted
toasts.watching: Used to notify the user that the alert on page change function has successfully been enabled. Should also tell the user to keep the tab open.
toasts.stoppedWatching: Used to notify the user that the alert on page change function has successfully been disabled.

actions.rollback: Text of the button to use system rollback
actions.revert: Text of the button to keep using rollback like (revert)

rollbackAvailableDialog.content: Used to ask users with the rollback permission if they want to use rollback or rollback like

tamperProtection.header: The title of the tamper protection dialog. Should be attention grabbing, like WARNING or ATTENTION
tamperProtection.warningContent: Body text of the tamper protection dialog. Should inform users that behavior like theirs is discouraged, and should be stopped. Optionally include a link using <a> tag syntax

warn.title: Title of the warn user dialog.

user.change: Option to change the target user
user.confirm: Confirmation button for changing the target user
user.load_wait: Message shown while getting user information, telling the user to wait
user.loading: Message shown while loading user information
user.levelInfo_none: Message shown when the target user has received no warnings in the last month
user.levelInfo_notice: Message shown when the target user has received a level 1 notice in the last month
user.levelInfo_caution: Message shown when the target user has received a level 2 notice in the last month
user.levelInfo_warning: Message shown when the target user has received a level 3 warning in the last month
user.levelInfo_final: Message shown when the target user has received a level 4 (final) warning in the last month
user.levelInfo_immediate: Message shown when the target user has received an immediate level 4 notice in the last month. Include the following as appropriate: $t(ui:warn.user.report)
user.report: Button to report the user to a board (like [[WP:AIV]] on enwiki)
user.edits: The number of edits by the target user - use the {{edits}} param as appropriate
user.age: How old the target user's account is - use the {{localeAge}} param as appropriate

talk.main: Button to show the target user's talk page
talk.month: The amount of notices the target user has received in the last month
talk.whole: Button to show the target user's entire talk page

show.userpage: Button to display the target user's user page
show.contributions: Button to display the target user's contributions

reason.page: Text of the field prompting users for the related page
reason.additionalText: Text of the field prompting users for additional text
reason.levelSelectionLevelNotPresent: Message shown when there is not a template at the specified level for the specified warning - use the {{level}} and {{levelReadable}} params as appropriate
reason.levelSelectionLevel: Selector for the template level - use the {{level}}, {{levelReadable}} and {{levelDescription}} params as appropriate
reason.searchDialogOpenerTooltip: Tooltip for the opener for the warning search dialog
reason.policyViolationTemplate: Name for warnings related to policy violations (eg "Policy Violation Warning")
reason.warningLevel: Text for specifying the warning level
reason.noWarningSelected: Message shown when no warnings have been selected

templateSearchDialog.instantSelect: Message telling the user to press ENTER to select the warnin
templateSearchDialog.tip: Tip explaining that you can double click to select a specific warning, or that you can press ENTER to select the top warning

validation.validationFailedIconTooltip: Message informing the user that there is an issue preventing them from sending the warning
validation.validationDialogTitle: Message when a single issue has been found
validation.validationDialogTitle_plural: Message when multiple issues have been foung
validation.validationDialogIntro: Text preceeding the list of issues (eg "The following issues are preventing this:")
validation.fail: Message when an unknown issue has occurred
validation.fail_template: Message when the user has not selected a template
validation.fail_level: Message when the user has not selected a warning level
validation.fail_user: Message when the user has not selected a target user
validation.fail_self: Message when the user is trying to warn themselves
validation.failDetailed: Message asking the user to inform the Ultraviolet developers if the issue persists - include $t(ui:warn.validation.fail) as appropriate
validation.failDetailed_template: Message asking the user to select a warning template through the dropdown or search tool - include $t(ui:warn.validation.fail_template) as appropriate
validation.failDetailed_level: Message asking the user to select a level for the warning template - include $t(ui:warn.validation.fail_level) as appropriate
validation.failDetailed_user: Message asking the user to enter a username in the target user box - include $t(ui:warn.validation.fail_user) as appropriate
validation.failDetailed_self: Message asking the user to use a sandbox user for testing - include $t(ui:warn.validation.fail_self) as appropriate
validation.pass: Message shown if there are no issues

risky.title: Title for the risk revert dialog
risky.content: Message informing the user that they are about to warn an administator and asking for confirmation

progress.prepare: Message shown while preparing the rollback/revert/revision restoration
progress.details: Message shown while getting information about the revision
progress.revert: Message shown while reverting the revision
progress.revert_rollback: Message shown while rolling back the revision
progress.restore: Message shown while restoring the revision
progress.finish: Message shown once the rollback/revert/revision restoration is complete

configErrorDialog.title: Title for the dialog used to inform the user that the loading of their configuration file failed.
configErrorDialog.content: Body text for the dialog used to inform the user that the loading of their configuration file failed. Inform the user that it has been reset to the default settings .

actions.data: This should be kept the same as the English one, since it uses the default OK text.

missing.title: Title for the dialog used to inform the user that the style set in their configuration file could not be found.
missing.content: Body text for the dialog used to inform the user that style set in their configuration file could not be found. Inform the user that it has been reset to the default style.

actions.data: This should be kept the same as the English one, since it uses the default OK text.

contribs.previewLink: Used for the preview rollback link on contributions page. Should be short/abbreviated.
contribs.previewTooltip: Full name of the preview rollback link, used for the tooltip
contribs.vandalLink: Used for the rollback vandalism link on contributions page. Should be short/abbreviated.
contribs.vandalTooltip: Full name of the rollback vandalism link, used for the tooltip
contribs.rollbackLink: Used for the rollback link on contributions page. Should be short/abbreviated.
contribs.rollbackTooltip: Full name of the rollback link, used for the tooltip
